attr.title: Squeek the Meek
attr.desc: A game about a whimpy mouse who cant fight, who has to save his friends from orcs.
attr.desc_md: Squeek the Meek is a top-down 2D stealth game in which our hero, Squeek, is too weak to kill any enemies. Still, the enemies are not very smart and can be tricked easily! Squeek gets into enemy camps to rescue other mice that have been kidnapped by an orc army.
